Sakon and Ukon create some distance between themselves and their opponent with a kick. They split, and summon a Rashōmon behind their opponent, before merging and activating their cursed seal. They pummel their opponent with their fists against the Rashōmon until it breaks.

== Trivia ==
* [[Wikipedia:Rakshasa|Rakshasa]] are demonic beings originating from Hindu mythology, some Rakshasa are depicted with several heads and arms.
